Estática knitr::kable(head(iris, 10)) Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species 5.1 3.5 1.4 0.2 setosa 4.9 3.0 1.4 0.2 setosa 4.7 3.2 1.3 0.2 setosa 4.6 3.1 1.5 0.2 setosa 5.0 3.6 1.4 0.2 setosa 5.4 3.9 1.7 0.4 setosa 4.6 3.4 1.4 0.3 setosa 5.0 3.4 1.5 0.2 setosa 4.4 2.9 1.4 0.2 setosa 4.9 3.1 1.5 0.1 setosa library(tidyverse) iris %>% ggplot(aes(Species, Sepal.Length, fill = Species)) + geom_boxplot() 4.2 V. Dinámica DT::datatable({ iris }) library(plotly) p <- iris %>% ggplot(aes(Species, Sepal.Length, fill = Species)) + geom_boxplot() ggplotly(p)
